title: NBA fouls out in China & cryptos versus regulation
text:
Trade negotiations between the US and China are set to resume this week, but now the fight has spilled over into a new realm... the basketball court. Professor Richard Wolff breaks down what the spat means for negotiations, and much more. And despite Bitcoin’s recent rollercoaster, the future of cryptocurrency may be bright given the state of global economics; cryptocurrency analyst Ben Swann and Raakhee Miller of Bitsian join the show to discuss.
